attributes.action: Stop changing the names of buildings with Christian names to appease.
attributes.additional_details: Several buildings in Birmingham are loosing their Christian identity. This needs to stop!
attributes.background: NHS/ local government Buildings with Christian names should remain Christian names even if the local community are not Christian. Everyone should be proud to live in this country with it's Christian history!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This issue appears to be the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
